midnight.name: How about going to bar?
midnight.desc: There is a street that full of Bar in Hong Kong call Lan Qui Fong, you can enjoy your chill time here

morning.name: Would you like to see the sun rise?
morning.desc: The sun rise meaning the start of the day and you will see everyone wake up and the city start working at that time.

morning.name: Sam Ka Tsuen
morning.desc: A urban fishing village which you can discover the old HK!

morning.name: West Kowloon Cultural District
morning.desc: A new place that you see the west side of the Victoria Harbour

afternoon.name: lets take some amazing photo !!!
afternoon.desc: Choi Hung Estate is a popular place to take photo because of its colorful building background

afternoon.name: Kwun Tong Sea Front
afternoon.desc: A place that is good for couple and have a nice walk, near some shopping spots and easy to reach

afternoon.name: Ocean Terminal Deck
afternoon.desc: The top roof of one of the famous shopping malls, can view Victoria Harbour in a different way

afternoon.name: Ma Wan Beach
afternoon.desc: Can view Tsing Ma Bridge in person, not just in car!

afternoon.name: Sam Ka Tsuen
afternoon.desc: A urban fishing village which you can discover the old HK!

afternoon.name: West Kowloon Cultural District
afternoon.desc: A new place that you see the west side of the Victoria Harbour

evening.name: Sun set in Hong Kong is nice
evening.desc: You may want to go Ha Pak Nai to see the sunset, it is really beautiful!!!

evening.name: Kwun Tong Sea Front
evening.desc: A place that is good for couple and have a nice walk, near some shopping spots and easy to reach

evening.name: Sai Wan Swimming Shed
evening.desc: People in old days will swim using this facilities, with a very nice sunset!

evening.name: Ocean Terminal Deck
evening.desc: The top roof of one of the famous shopping malls, can view Victoria Harbour in a different way

evening.name: Ma Wan Beach
evening.desc: Can view Tsing Ma Bridge in person, not just in car!

evening.name: West Kowloon Cultural District
evening.desc: A new place that you see the west side of the Victoria Harbour
